explanation: The stage direction describes an action involving an object. Nicaise gives ('donne') 24 sols and takes ('prend') all the songs ('chansons') that he distributes ('distribue'). These actions involve the handling and exchange of objects (money and songs), which fits the definition of Category 10: object.
stgdir: Nicaise donne ses 24 sols, et prend toutes les chansons qu'il distribue.
